1622000.name: Leave!
1622000.description:
This a VR Horror game in which you get full control of where you move and need to collect lost eyeballs of those who traversed this forest before you.
You are a detective who follows missing person cases and it seems entering this forest was a big mistake as you are locked inside with no escape unless you collect what is needed of the victims to leave this landscape.
1622000.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
